title: WATERS GeoViewer
description:
This EPA GeoPlatform hosted Web Mapping Application can be used to view data and execute web services provided by the Watershed Assessment, Tracking & Environmental Results System (WATERS) (https://www.epa.gov/waterdata/waters-watershed-assessment-tracking-environmental-results-system).

Data

  • It contains features from the NHDPlus Dataset (https://www.epa.gov/waterdata/nhdplus-national-hydrography-dataset-plus) and data from WATERS.
Please note, popups have been configured for each feature class in the map which provide access to additional feature level attributes.

Services

  • Upstream / Downstream Search – provides NHDPlus stream network traversal and network-based search for linked events.
  • Watershed Delineation – allows users to create boundaries that represent the drainage area for a specific location.
  • Watershed Report – produces a report of selected NHDPlus and StreamCat attributes for the requested stream and associated catchment and watershed.
snippet: This Web Mapping Application allows users to view data and execute web services provided by the US EPA Office of Water’s Watershed Assessment, Tracking & Environmental Results System (WATERS).
accessInformation: Maintainer: US EPA Office of Water.  Data source(s): Various federal, state, local, and water agency.  Acknowledgement of the EPA would be appreciated.
licenseInfo: The user is responsible for reading and evaluating dataset limitations, restrictions, and intended use. For additional information, please see WATERS Terms of Use and Disclaimer.
